messages.content: ComfyUI-Fans is an extension for ComfyUI that provides additional nodes to enhance the functionality of the GUI.
How many nodes are included in ComfyUI-Fans?
ComfyUI-Fans contains 4 nodes: Fans Styler (Max 10 Style), Fans Text Concat (Until 10 text), Fans Prompt Styler Postive, and Fans Prompt Styler Negative.
To install ComfyUI-Fans, clone the repository to your ComfyUI `custom_nodes` directory using the command: `git clone https://github.com/uarefans/ComfyUI-Fans`, and then restart your ComfyUI.
Can you modify the CSV filenames in ComfyUI-Fans?
No, you should not modify the CSV filenames inside the styles folder of ComfyUI-Fans.
What can you edit within the CSV files in ComfyUI-Fans?
You can edit the content within the CSV files of ComfyUI-Fans. The first column is reserved for indexing, and the second column is for content. You have the flexibility to modify both columns.
What is the output format of the nodes in ComfyUI-Fans?
The output format of the nodes in ComfyUI-Fans is in string format, making it versatile for various use cases.
Do you need to restart ComfyUI after editing the CSV files in ComfyUI-Fans?
No, after editing the CSV files in ComfyUI-Fans, there's no need to restart ComfyUI. Simply refresh it or your browser to see the changes.
Is there a video available demonstrating ComfyUI-Fans?
Yes, a video demonstrating ComfyUI-Fans is available at: https://github.com/uarefans/ComfyUI-Fans/assets/76769414/dd2b3938-3e95-48d7-bf0e-b0ea86a65cef
